step1.title: Browse Projects
step1.description: Explore projects across different technologies and find ones that interest you.

step2.title: Request to Join
step2.description: Send a contribution request with your message to the project author.

step3.title: Start Contributing
step3.description: Once accepted, join the project chat and start collaborating with the team.
